definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

pinyin: Sheng4 Bo2 duo1 lu4 Da4 dian4

sentences.english: It was an ancient graffiti providing evidence of the presence of Peter's body in the necropolis .
sentences.chinese: 这件古老的证物证明了伯多禄的遗体就在这个墓地。

sentences.english: Having an interior storm of doubting thoughts, Peter was sinking.
sentences.chinese: 受到内心怀疑的风暴搅扰，伯多禄险遭倾覆。

sentences.english: They both ran, but the other disciple outran Peter and reached the tomb first;
sentences.chinese: 伯多禄便和那另一个门徒出来，往坟墓那去了。

sentences.english: And Peter taking him, began to rebuke him.
sentences.chinese: 伯多禄便拉他到一边，开始谏责他。

sentences.english: Perhaps it serves to give credence to the existence of Peter the Apostle.
sentences.chinese: 或许它证明了伯多禄作为使徒的存在。

sentences.english: On that day Peter was looking for a witness to all this.
sentences.chinese: 那天，伯多禄就是在找出这一切的见证人。

definition: John (less common form of 若望[Ruo4 wang4] or 約翰|约翰[Yue1 han4])
Matthew/St Matthew the evangelist/less common variant of 馬太|马太[Ma3 tai4] (preferred by the Catholic Church)
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
